remarks: Group operation on the group of Dirichlet characters.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Apr-2016.)
statement:
dchrmhm.g $e |- G = ( DChr ` N ) $.
dchrmhm.z $e |- Z = ( Z/nZ ` N ) $.
dchrmhm.b $e |- D = ( Base ` G ) $.
dchrmul.t $e |- .x. = ( +g ` G ) $.
dchrplusg.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN ) $.
dchrplusg $p |- ( ph -> .x. = ( oF x. |` ( D X. D ) ) ) $.
